attributes.action: Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students
attributes.additional_details: I want them to do this because it will be fair for all of the students. Right now, they have given colleges the decision and some of the colleges have made the wrong decisions which can cause a lot of problems due to the fact that some of us are vulnerable, including our family and we do not want to pass on the virus to them.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to cancel all BTEC exams completely leaving the schools and colleges with no choice like they have with the GCSEs and A Levels as well. This is very unfair for the BTEC students and it is not right at all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
